sources.name: Ratings
sources.script:
source(output(
		userId as string,
		movieId as integer,
		rating as decimal(10,0),
		timestamp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Ratings

sources.name: Movies
sources.script:
source(output(
		adult as string,
		id as integer,
		release_date as string,
		revenue as string,
		runtime as string,
		tagline as string,
		title as string,
		vote_average as string,
		vote_count as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Select1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Ratings, Movies join(movieId == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(titles = title),
	rating = avg(rating),
		movieId = max(movieId)) ~> Aggregate1

transformations.name: Origdata
transformations.script:
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		userId,
		movieId,
		rating,
		timestamp,
		adult,
		id,
		release_date,
		revenue,
		runtime,
		tagline,
		title,
		vote_average,
		vote_count
	))~> Origdata

transformations.name: Join2
transformations.script:
Aggregate1, Origdata join(Aggregate1@movieId == Origdata@movieId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		title = titles,
		rating = Aggregate1@rating,
		movieId = Aggregate1@movieId,
		userId,
		timestamp,
		adult,
		id,
		release_date,
		revenue,
		runtime,
		tagline,
		vote_average,
		vote_count
	))~> Select1
